body_html:
@ezyang isn't it cleaner to just have the CuDNN bindings make weight contiguous always...?

Yeah, I was vacillating between the two ways. I'll swap it.

I think we can just return out; here to fix the Windows CI error

It's not just a CI error; it's a legit bug. Thanks for pointing it out!

> @ezyang isn't it cleaner to just have the CuDNN bindings make weight contiguous always...?

Yeah, I was vacillating between the two ways. I'll swap it.

> I think we can just return out; here to fix the Windows CI error

It's not just a CI error; it's a legit bug. Thanks for pointing it out!
